content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, I'm glad to have you here. Let's discuss the rental price of the apartment. What are you willing to pay for a 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I was thinking 700 Euros per month. Is that acceptable?

(Note: This is the lowest price I am willing to pay, but I am open to negotiation.)
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Aziz. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 700 Euros per month, I'm afraid that's not quite what I'm looking for. I'm sure we can work something out if you're willing to pay a higher price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Sure, what is your proposed rental price?

(Note: I am willing to negotiate, but I need to know a starting point.)

TERMINATE
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I apologize for the misunderstanding. My proposed rental price for the apartment is 1,000 Euros per month. Of course, I'm open to negotiation and I'm willing to discuss other terms as well. What are your thoughts on this price?
name: Heinrich Heine
